long_description: The Topeak DeFender XC11 Rear Fender offers hassle-free coverage for your 27.5 in. rear wheel, helping protect you and your bike from mud and trail debris. High-impact plastic fender has a flexible trailing edge to resist damage; highly polished underside of the fender helps prevent dirt buildup in muddy conditions. Quick-release clamp secures around your bike's seatpost and fits seatpost diameters 25.4 - 34.9mm. It's easy to adjust fender angle thanks to multiple pivots, letting you set the fender's position to your liking.
short_description: The Topeak DeFender XC11 Rear Fender offers hassle-free coverage for your 27.5 in. rear wheel, helping protect you and your bike from mud and trail debris.
